languages.text: "Конвой попал в засаду и был перебит — за исключением чудесного спасения одного рядового. Я рассчитываю, что вы займетесь расследованием".
"The convoy was ambushed and massacred in its entirety, save for one private's miraculous survival. I am counting on you to investigate the incident."
languages.original_text: "Конвой попал в засаду и был перебит — за исключением чудесного спасения одного рядового. Я рассчитываю, что вы займетесь расследованием".

traits.locale_text: "The convoy was ambushed and massacred in its entirety, save for one private's miraculous survival. I am counting on you to investigate the incident."
"The convoy was ambushed and massacred in its entirety, save for one private's miraculous survival. I am counting on you to investigate the incident."
"The convoy was ambushed and massacred in its entirety, save for one private's miraculous survival. I am counting on you to investigate the incident."
"The convoy was ambushed and massacred in its entirety, save for one private's miraculous survival. I am counting on you to investigate the incident."
"The convoy was ambushed and massacred in its entirety, save for one private's miraculous survival. I am counting on you to investigate the incident."
"The convoy was ambushed and massacred in its entirety, save for one private's miraculous survival. I am counting on you to investigate the incident."

languages.text: "Der Konvoi wurde aus dem Hinterhalt angegriffen und vollständig massakriert. Nur ein einziger Soldat hat auf wundersame Weise überlebt. Ich zähle darauf, dass Ihr den Vorfall untersucht."
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed and massacred in its entirety, save for one private's miraculous survival. I am counting on you to investigate the incident."

traits.locale_text: "Der Konvoi wurde aus dem Hinterhalt angegriffen und vollständig massakriert. Nur ein einziger Soldat hat auf wundersame Weise überlebt. Ich zähle darauf, dass Ihr den Vorfall untersucht."

languages.text: « Le convoi est tombé dans une embuscade et a été décimé, à l'exception d'un soldat qui a survécu par miracle. Je compte sur vous pour enquêter sur cet incident. »
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed and massacred in its entirety, save for one private's miraculous survival. I am counting on you to investigate the incident."

traits.locale_text: « Le convoi est tombé dans une embuscade et a été décimé, à l'exception d'un soldat qui a survécu par miracle. Je compte sur vous pour enquêter sur cet incident. »

languages.text: “护卫队遭到了伏击，全员阵亡。只有一名士兵奇迹般地活了下来，我希望你能好好调查这件事情。”
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed and massacred in its entirety, save for one private's miraculous survival. I am counting on you to investigate the incident."

traits.locale_text: “护卫队遭到了伏击，全员阵亡。只有一名士兵奇迹般地活了下来，我希望你能好好调查这件事情。”

languages.text: 「護衛隊は襲撃されて、奇跡的に生き残ったひとりの兵卒以外は、みんな殺された。事件の調査を頼むよ」
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed and massacred in its entirety, save for one private's miraculous survival. I am counting on you to investigate the incident."

traits.locale_text: 「護衛隊は襲撃されて、奇跡的に生き残ったひとりの兵卒以外は、みんな殺された。事件の調査を頼むよ」

languages.text: «El convoy fue emboscado y masacrado por completo, salvo por la milagrosa supervivencia de un soldado raso. Cuento con usted para investigar el incidente».
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed and massacred in its entirety, save for one private's miraculous survival. I am counting on you to investigate the incident."

traits.locale_text: «El convoy fue emboscado y masacrado por completo, salvo por la milagrosa supervivencia de un soldado raso. Cuento con usted para investigar el incidente».

languages.text: "Konvoy pusuya düşürülmüş ve mucizevi şekilde hayatta kalan tek bir er hariç hepsi katledilmiş. Bu hadiseyi araştırmanızı bekliyorum."
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed and massacred in its entirety, save for one private's miraculous survival. I am counting on you to investigate the incident."

traits.locale_text: "Konvoy pusuya düşürülmüş ve mucizevi şekilde hayatta kalan tek bir er hariç hepsi katledilmiş. Bu hadiseyi araştırmanızı bekliyorum."
